house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1949 has 2 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 1 car attached garage and approximately 1800 square feet of living area. Rooms include den, dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, air conditioning.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Hometown RE/MAX Hometown Lic. Real Estate Broker
